audioText: J'ai rencontré mon ancien professeur qui a sauvé notre projet quand nous avons fermé le bureau.
question: What happened when they closed the office?
options: The former teacher saved their project after they met
They decided to abandon all their work completely
They moved everything to a new location immediately
They lost contact with everyone from work
explanation: The text states 'J'ai rencontré mon ancien professeur qui a sauvé notre projet quand nous avons fermé le bureau' - I met my former teacher who saved our project when we closed the office. This combines multiple target conjugates: 'rencontré' (met), 'sauvé' (saved), and 'fermé' (closed).
